items.sentence: Have you made up your mind about what you\'re going to give Tom for his birthday?
Tom followed Mary into the kitchen, picked up a knife and threatened her with it.

Tom knew it was going to be tough to convince Mary that she was too old to drive.

Tom promised Mary that he\'d pay back all the money that he\'d borrowed from her.
